title: Bitcoin Hits Record High Against Yen as Japan's New PM Sanae Plans to Revive 'Abenomics'
contentSnippet: The yen weakened as Sanae said that her government would lead fiscal and monetary policy setting.

title: Unity patches Android mobile bug, says no evidence of exploit
contentSnippet: Unity has patched a vulnerability discovered in June that allowed malicious code execution in Android games, which could be used to target crypto users.

title: Warren Buffett loves the S&P 500, but it’s down 88% on Bitcoin
contentSnippet: While the Standard and Poor’s 500 is at record highs, data shows the stock index has “collapsed” when compared to Bitcoin. Is it a fair comparison?

title: Dogecoin Holds $0.25 Support as Whales Add 30M DOGE Amid 'Ascending Triangle' Pattern
contentSnippet: Whales and mid-tier wallets increased their holdings, indicating accumulation as the price forms an ascending triangle.

title: XRP Rejected Above $3, Closes Lower as Sellers Dominate
contentSnippet: Institutional prints confirmed $3.07 as resistance, while repeated defenses near $2.98 kept losses contained.

title: US national debt rises by an eye-watering $6B every day
contentSnippet: The US national debt is nearing $38 trillion, with many more now seeing Bitcoin’s appeal as a viable alternative to the dollar.

title: DAT企業資産が20兆円規模に拡大も懸念浮上、ボラティリティ依存が課題＝VanEckレポート
contentSnippet: VanEckは最新レポートでDAT企業の保有資産が20兆円規模に拡大したと報告した。ブームが継続する中、レポートはボラティリティ依存型のDAT企業の戦略の持続可能性に懸念を表明した。

title: スタンダードチャータード銀、2025年末にビットコイン20万ドル予想を維持
contentSnippet: スタンダード・チャータード銀行が仮想通貨ビットコインの2025年末価格を20万ドルと予想している。ETF流入と米政府閉鎖を上昇要因に挙げた。

title: Bitcoin will ‘blast through’ to its next leg at $150K: Analysts
contentSnippet: Analysts predict further gains to $150,000 after Bitcoin surged to a record high, driven by massive ETF inflows and a weakening US dollar.

title: Companies spent $1.2B on Bitcoin last week, but BTC ETFs stole the show
contentSnippet: Bitcoin-stacking companies bought over 6,700 BTC last week with the majority of the buying came from Japanese investment firm Metaplanet.

title: ビットコイン史上最高値更新、独歩高の背景に強気の投資家態度｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインは5日、史上最高値を更新した。金融市場全体における「脱中央集権的リスクヘッジ資産」としてのBTC存在感を際立たせている。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Why Russia-Linked Stablecoin Issuer A7A5 Could Exhibit at Token2049 Despite Singapore Sanctions
contentSnippet: Singapore made a bold move in its usual foreign policy of neutrality by sanctioning Promsvyazbank, a bank associated with the ruble stablecoin issuer A7A5, due to Russia's invasion of Ukraine. But A7A

title: メタマスク、最大級のオンチェーン報酬プログラムを開始へ　独自トークンとも関連か
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレットのメタマスクが大規模報酬プログラムを予定している。シーズン1のみで45億円相当のLINEA配布を予定し、独自トークンとの連携も示唆されている。

title: GENIUS Act could mark end of banking rip-off: Multicoin exec
contentSnippet: Traditional banks will be battling with stablecoin issuers for retail depositors when the stablecoin-focused GENIUS Act takes full effect in a win for everyday people.

title: Solana’s Upcoming Architectural Changes and Why They Matter
contentSnippet: VanEck says Solana’s Alpenglow upgrade will make the network faster, more stable and easier to run, as developers prepare even deeper performance changes.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Morgan Stanley recommends 'conservative' crypto allocation for some portfolios
contentSnippet: The financial services company recommended modest crypto allocations for balanced risk and high-growth portfolios with periodic rebalancing.

title: DefiLlama to delist Aster perpetual volume data over integrity concerns
contentSnippet: The decentralized finance analytics platform said that perpetual trading volumes on Aster were almost perfectly correlated to Binance volume.

title: Donald Trump and Bitcoin: From 'Not a Fan' to Crypto President
contentSnippet: President Trump used to slam Bitcoin as "a scam." Now he's back in the White House and making crypto moves for both himself and the U.S.

title: Bitcoin hits all-time high as USD on track for worst year since 1973: Analyst
contentSnippet: Safe-haven and bearer assets are surging alongside risk-on assets like stocks, an unusual combination that signals a macroeconomic shift.

title: The Best Nintendo Switch 2 Games to Play Right Now
contentSnippet: Got a Switch 2? These are the games you'll want to check out first, including heavyweights like Mario Kart, Donkey Kong, and Zelda.

title: The Fed's Next Move on Oct. 29: How a Scenario Few Expect Could Derail U.S. Stocks and Crypto
contentSnippet: Markets brace for the Fed’s Oct. 29 FOMC decision amid shutdown and U.S. jobs market and inflation uncertainty, with crypto and stocks vulnerable to sharp downside moves.

title: What SWIFT's Blockchain Means for Stablecoins and Global Banks
contentSnippet: The company that underpins the global financial messaging system is building infrastructure for onchain settlement as it seeks a role in blockchain-based finance.

title: 'Sell Shovels': This Firm Makes Dashboards for Strategy and Dozens of Bitcoin Treasuries
contentSnippet: As Bitcoin treasury firms proliferate in the U.S., an engineer-by-day is building dashboards for them on the other side of the world.

title: Trump-Linked World Liberty Financial's Stablecoin Needs Better Attestation Reports, NYDIG Says
contentSnippet: NYDIG noted that the delay in reporting is notable, given USD1's growing profile and $2.7 billion in supply, and may be a concern for investors.

title: BTCFi’s Big Problem: 77% of Bitcoin Holders Haven’t Even Tried It, Says Survey
contentSnippet: A new GoMining survey shows Bitcoin finance has a marketing and trust problem — despite packed conferences and venture funding, most holders are staying away.

title: Bitcoin at Historic Highs: 3 Critical Levels to Watch Now
contentSnippet: BTC rose to a record high of over $125,000 Sunday, extending the weekly gain to 11.5%.

title: Bitcoin Hits New All-Time High Price Above $125,000
contentSnippet: The leading digital asset as been on a tear in 2025. How high can it go?

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、BTC20万ドル到達分析や米国でXRPなどのETF個別申請が不要になど
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナといった主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: ビットコイン1700万円台後半に回復、米政府機関閉鎖で逃避資金流入｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: 今週のビットコイン円相場は1775万円周辺まで反発。米政府機関閉鎖による逃避資金流入と利下げ期待の復活が支援材料に。ドル建て12万ドル回復で史上最高値更新の可能性を解説。

title: 週刊ニュース｜自称IQ276投資家のBTCへの全財産転換やポケカ等のトークン化トレンド分析に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、自称IQ276の投資家によるビットコインへの全財産転換、米政府閉鎖による仮想通貨ETF承認手続き停滞、バイナンスによるビッグトレンド分析に関する記事が最も関心を集めた。

title: Defiance Proposes 3X Leveraged Exposure on Bitcoin, Ethereum Funds and Crypto Stocks
contentSnippet: Defiance's prospectus to the SEC on Friday outlines 49 ETFs that would provide leveraged exposure to Bitcoin funds, crypto firms, and more.

title: After 30 Days Without Food, AI Protester Finally Quits Hunger Strike
contentSnippet: AI activist Guido Reichstadter ended his 30-day hunger strike outside Anthropic HQ.

title: Trump Tariff Stimmy? Here’s How Much Covid Stimulus Checks Are Worth Now If Invested in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: President Trump said this week that Americans could receive a cut of tariff revenue. Here's why it might be a good idea to invest those funds in Bitcoin.

title: We Tested the Best Free AI Image Editors—Here's What You'll Love and Hate
contentSnippet: AI image editing has moved from painful workflows to plain English prompts—here’s how today’s top free models stack up.

title: What Next for the UK's $7 Billion in Seized Bitcoin?
contentSnippet: Crypto industry groups are split over what the UK government should do with the 61,000 BTC seized in a recent criminal case.

title: 仮想通貨強気相場を加速か？　トランプ米大統領が最大2000ドルの給付金を検討
contentSnippet: 米国のトランプ大統領が関税収入を基に最大2,000ドルの国民給付金を検討している。コロナ禍では給付金がビットコイン上昇を後押ししており仮想通貨市場への影響が注目される。

title: ビットコインマイニング大手MARA、BTC保有量が1兆円に迫る
contentSnippet: Maraが発表した9月の生産実績によると、218ブロックを獲得し前月比5%増を記録した。ビットコイン保有量は52,850BTCに達し、上場企業の中でストラテジーに次ぐ第2位の保有額。

title: ウォルマート傘下のワンペイ、仮想通貨取引機能を年内追加へ
contentSnippet: ウォルマートが過半数を所有するフィンテック企業ワンペイが年内にモバイルアプリで仮想通貨取引とカストディサービスを開始すると報じられた。

title: 'Nothing Illegal': Creator of ICE Tracking App Plans Legal Action After Apple Removal
contentSnippet: Apple and Google pulled ICE tracking apps following pressure from the federal government. One developer plans to fight back.
